car_slug: # Known Issues Template for Car Pipeline
# 1. Fill in one row per known issue
# 2. car_slug must match the car's slug exactly

title: Rear Main Seal Leak
description: Oil leak from rear main seal at higher mileages. Common on earlier production cars.
symptoms: Oil spots under car|Burning oil smell|Low oil level
fix_description: Requires engine removal to replace seal. Best done with clutch replacement if manual.
